ygData.subject: Re: Piercing or blunt?
ygData.msgSnippet: Great weapon:  dmg 12, delay 22, and weight 5 Haven t heard whether it is magical or not, if so, it is easily THE best weapon in game for mage classes because
ygData.messageBody:
Great weapon: dmg 12, delay 22, and weight 5
Haven't heard whether it is magical or not, if so, it is easily THE best
weapon in game for mage classes because of its stats AND it frees up your
other hand. I have heard where to get it but have forgotten, sorry. But
what I do remember is that it is designed to be tough to get until you are
Lvl 40+. Better make interim weapon plans if you are still in the teens
like me ))

-----Original Message-----
From: DSchm75588@... [mailto:DSchm75588@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 12, 1999 4:05 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Piercing or blunt?

From: DSchm75588@...

Piercing is the way to go. I am an advocate of it because
of the Pugius, the
fanged skull stilleto, and the certain skull that was talked
about so many
times prior. With a Pugius right now at lvl 13, and the
skull, life is much
easier. Plus 20 mana is better than the runed staff can
provide, and the
Pugius attacks much, much quicker. I am still looking for a
fanged skull
stilleto (anyone know where to get them), but once I have
found one, life
will be much easier.
Zaeq, Wizard of E'ci
